tool.name: Slice MD trajectories
tool.command: ln -s '$traj' traj.${traj.ext} && mdconvert traj.${traj.ext} -o output.${traj.ext} -i $start:$end:$stride && mv output.${traj.ext} '$output'

param.label: Stride
param.help: i.e. load every nth frame from the input file

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool extracts a segment from a molecular dynamcics trajectory (i.e. performs a slice).
_____
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
- Trajectory file (trr, xtc, dcd)
In addition, a start frame and end frame have to be specified for the output trajectory, in addition to a value 'stride' (to save only every nth frame in the output file). _____
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
- Trajectory file (trr, xtc, dcd) extracted from the input file.
